qa.overall_assessment: Google Maps MCP to skill conversion meets all requirements. Skill structure is correct, progressive disclosure implemented, all 6 agents updated, MCP tool naming correct, no hardcoded API keys, and comprehensive documentation provided.

Directory structure matches reference pattern

tools/weather.md:9: mcp__plugin_google-maps_google-maps__lookup_weather
All 3 tools use consistent naming pattern
Pattern matches: mcp__plugin_<server>_<plugin>__<tool>

root_cause_verification.rationale: Previous Yelp implementation was incorrectly placed in .claude/commands/ directory. Google Maps skill correctly implemented in .claude/skills/google-maps/ with proper SKILL.md naming, following the corrected pattern. All structural and organizational issues from previous implementation avoided.

regression_test_results.details: Skill directory structure matches reference patterns (amadeus-flight, tripadvisor, yelp)
All 6 agent files maintain valid YAML frontmatter with google-maps added to skills arrays
6 total markdown files (1 SKILL.md + 3 tools + 2 examples) organized correctly
No broken file references. All agent documentation correctly references google-maps skill

mcp_tools_documented.purpose: Search for locations, businesses, and points of interest
Compute travel routes with multiple travel modes
Get current weather information for locations

qa_notes: Skill structure correctly follows amadeus-flight and tripadvisor reference patterns
Progressive disclosure properly implemented with main file under 1000 tokens
All MCP tool names use correct format with plugin_google-maps_google-maps prefix
Security best practices followed - no hardcoded credentials, environment variables documented
All 6 required agents updated with google-maps in skills array
Comprehensive error handling with retry logic and WebSearch fallback
Tool files provide detailed parameter documentation and use cases
YAML frontmatter complete with all required fields
No regressions detected in agent files or directory structure

comparison_with_yelp_skill.consistency: high - both skills follow same pattern

recommendations: Skill is production-ready and approved for use
Test MCP server connection with actual GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY
Verify API quotas and rate limits for production use
Consider caching strategies for frequently accessed places/routes
Monitor WebSearch fallback usage to identify MCP reliability issues
